actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income taxation interest on certain governmental obligations issued for the certified restoration of historic structures.

summary.text: Exempts from taxation, under the Internal Revenue Code, interest on specified governmental obligations issued for the certified restoration of historic structures. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 103)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income taxation interest on certain governmental obligations issued for the certified restoration of historic structures.
